ygData.messageBody:
*spoiler*













chlebek@... wrote:

> > I am on a mission today for STR increasing items
> > (my base STR is 75 eeeuoo). I have heard people
> > like Shada talk about a purity belt. What is it,
> > how much is it, and where can I get one?
> >
> > Weiland the Extremely Poor Bard of Freeport
> > Erollisi Marr
>
> The purity belts are AC3, +2 STR, +2 STA. They usually sell for anywhere from
> 5pp to 10pp. They are found on the island of the Sisters of Erollisi. On this
> island are warriors just named "a sister of erollisi" that carry a rusty halberd
> and a purity belt.

The information above is correct. My gnome necromancer has sold MANY MANY of these
belts. I also have about 60 still in the bank. If you're on Karana, I'll sell you
one cheap.

I sell mine for 2 or 3 plat btw... when you have 100 to move, holding out for 5 to
10 plat isn't feasible. :)

One thing to note, killing sisters is bad for your wood elf faction. It's something
like this:

Faydark's champions worse
Clerics of tunare worse
Kingtearisthex worse
Emerald warriors worse
Crushbone orcs better

Yes, that's right, your faction with CB orcs goes UP.

Jyzan
